comment.text: This translation key is used to display the "Storage period" label in various security settings pages. It will appear as a subheader or caption, indicating the duration of stored login history or audit trail data.

usage.context:
<HistoryMainContent
 t={t}
 loginHistory
 subHeader={t("LoginSubheaderTitle")}
 latestText={t("LoginLatestText")}
 storagePeriod={t("StoragePeriod")}
 saveButtonLabel={t("Common:SaveButton")}
 cancelButtonLabel={t("Common:CancelButton")}
 lifetime={securityLifetime.loginHistoryLifeTime}
 securityLifetime={securityLifetime}
 setLifetimeAuditSettings={setLifetimeAuditSettings}

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation "ආචයන පරාසය" does not accurately convey the meaning of "Storage period." "ආචයන" relates to attraction or allure, which is not relevant to storage duration. A more appropriate translation would focus on the concept of time or duration.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider alternatives like "භදාරක කාලය" (bhadaaraka kaalaya - storage time), "සංරක්ෂණ කාලය" (sanrakshana kaalaya - preservation time), or "ගත කරන කාලය" (gathakaraya kaalaya - elapsed time). The best choice will depend on the specific context.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The Serbian translation "Период складиштења" while technically correct, doesn't perfectly capture the nuance of "Storage period" in the context of settings.  "Storage period" implies a duration for data retention. "Период складиштења" literally translates to "storage period" and could imply a physical storage space rather than a data retention timeframe.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider "Време чувања" or "Рок чувања" which translates to "retention period" or "expiration period" respectively and aligns better with the likely intended meaning within a settings context.
